lenders.name: B. Brothers Maisha Soul
lenders.loan_because: i want to progress...
lenders.occupational_info:
The group is known by the name of MAISHA SOUL which means simply “SOUL of LIFE”. 

In 2003, after a great events happening in GOMA, the volcano eruption, a great number of population became homeless and spending their night under the stars and suddenly the country was occupied by the different rebellions that could not guaranteed the security. 
Life condition of a man Congolese people not having been favourable to the Congo (our country). An idea came to a Christian family living in the same misfortune as well as passionate in music and this is composed with two parents with five brothers and one sister fond of music, four brother very much passionate and coming from different choir in Catholic church in GOMA under this initiative one of these four who is the eldest of the family called Prince Agakan , and able to create in July 2nd 2003 a musical group called dji:life which means in English “group of life” that actually changed its name into MAISHA SOUL. 
This having been in the place, the three brothers measures themselves to give one another a hand by the initiative of their older brother.

Inspired by the traditional songs and modern, MAISHA SOUL measures itself to bring a contribution with a combination well resolved by many styles such as R&B, soul, slow, Raga, HIP HOP traditional and modern; for giving another sound that reveals its own accent and decided itself to do a music commitment and research. Hence, MAISHA SOUL suggest, regarding the social situation that progress in risk as well as in peril in Africa in General and in the DRC in particular, to give its value added through this peaceful message and peaceful cohabitation in order eventually may reign brotherhood, equality, and freedom .

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because:
My son showed me this site.  I work in a restaurant. One of our regular customers recently passed away.  The elderly gentleman had always been lighthearted and sociable. He continued to  brighten the day of people around him even after suffering a stroke.. His family gave me a gift of money for my kindness to their father.  This  money, I am passing along to help others.  Seemed like a very good thing to do with it.
I chose to donate to a person working in agriculture as I worked and grew up on a farm.
lenders.occupational_info: I have quit working at the restaurant.  I now help care for our grandson while my daughter is at work.  I have also joined a craft group at the church I attend.  We make mostly knitted or crochet projects which are sold to help raise money to support the church and help others.

lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people take action to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently finished an undergraduate degree in zoology at the University of Guelph and now I am working as a biological control research assistant at CABI Europe in Switzerland.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I think microloan lending can help people who don't have a lot of options improve their lives.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I never would have made it this far in life without help from others.  I'm just paying forward some of my good fortune.

lenders.name: darby
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a nursing assistant. I'm a doula, which involves assisting women in childbirth. I'm a childbirth educator and a nursing student.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are not just looking for a handout.  I respect these entrepreneurs and believe they are key to improving life where they live.
lenders.occupational_info: Nature and Fine Art Photographer

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: Because I'm a Christian. And because it puts into practice what I learn at university.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at a University in Germany. I'm working on my B.Sc. in Economics, the field where micro-credits have their origin.

lenders.name: Synnøve
lenders.loan_because: I belive in people.  And becauce I can.

lenders.name: Isabelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people have a good business so that they can be healthy and help their kids go to school like I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to elementary school so I learn reading, writing, math and I also get to play with my friends

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students (15-18 years old) about history, economics, geography and government.

lenders.name: Carina
lenders.loan_because: Soy profesional universitario, técnico de la facultad de medicina. Pero en mi país si te quedas desempleado, así seas universitario, es muy dificil volver al mercado laboral. Tengo tres hijos pequeños y por lo tanto es muy dificil salir de mi casa, lo que me dificulta más la reinsercción laboral. Por eso estoy desarrollando un proyecto de servicios a distancia, vender dietas y servicios a través de internet. Necesito dinero para equipo, accesorios del pc, una video y cámara de fotos.
lenders.occupational_info: Soy nutricionista dietista, egresada de la facultad de medicina. Realizo, dietas, planes de alimentación para personas en general y organizo planes de menú para las familias. Todo esto lo realizo a distancia, a través de internet. También ofresco realizar asesoramiento a empresas de alimentos. Cursos de nutrición a distancia.

lenders.name: Carol Jane
lenders.loan_because: because I can.

lenders.name: Moreau Catholic
lenders.loan_because: As a Holy Cross high school, we believe in the importance of helping our students become responsible citizens of our global community. Lending through Kiva provides students an opportunity by which they can become part of helping others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a co-educational college preparatory high school in the Holy Cross tradition located in Hayward, CA. As an innovative 21st century one-to-one laptop school, we believe in helping students understand their role in the larger global society.

lenders.name: Jmm
lenders.loan_because: We load to help out others and hopefully make a difference in the lives of many people.
lenders.occupational_info: We are the students taking International Business at Memorial High School. We learn about global business as well as gain new knowledge and insights every day in class.

lenders.name: Carmel and Jon
lenders.loan_because: People the world over just need a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: Retiring  from work in a big city in California just wasn't for us so we found a big house in a little town in Pennsylvania and are very happy. there.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Letra
lenders.occupational_info:
Resiliently unemployed and, And I'm wanting   to open my own Cleaning Service, With BONUS Building Care Opening it will give me more time to spend with my boys.Each BONUS Building Care customer receives a cleaning schedule customized for their facility. Your cleaning schedule can be designed to fit the needs of your workplace no matter how unique it may be. Our cleaning goals are to make sure your goals for cleaning are met in your working environment.  
Decades of experience in the cleaning industry has prepared the management at BONUS Building Care to customize a program of cleaning that will effectively manage and perform the cleaning tasks required in your workplace.

Insured, bonded security conscious cleaning crews 
Trained personnel equipped with commercial
equipment 
Inspected by our operations staff for quality insurance

We have the solution to any cleaning problem you may have and would like the opportunity to provide you with a fully customized cleaning program for your workplace. Night after night we take great pride in providing only the best in service. Why not let us provide it for you?

lenders.occupational_info: Banker

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others reach their goals.

lenders.name: Ben

lenders.occupation: Real Estate Broker/ Youth Ministry Director
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the love of Christ

lenders.name: Miriam
lenders.loan_because: I read about the needs across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sole caregiver for a handicapped husband.

lenders.name: Yann
lenders.loan_because: when I see the outrageous amount of money that Banks make out of trading on Poverty, it makes me feel bit better to try and help avoid more victims of their cupidity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the mail order industry.  My job consists in delivering ideas that make my patron's customers happy to purchase from them.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be given a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: clerical

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people in an unhelpful world.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial business consulting... lecture Principles of Microeconomics on occasion at Virginia Commonwealth University.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: God directs me to as a steward for His kingdom.
lenders.occupational_info: I pray and and ask God for clear directions  on what to do with money.  Then I do what He tells me.  Its enjoyable work.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe there is a need for help that contributes to raising the independence and the self-esteem of the client, rather than help that keeps the recipient in a state of dependence and inferiority. That's why I want to make a part of my private means available for emerging market entrepreneurs with a capital need.
lenders.occupational_info:
My support will primarily go individuals and cooperatives with the most moderate funding needs. That way I hope to reach out and help as many of my fellow human beings that I possibly can and to make a positive impact on their life and future prospects.
In my own daily life I work for NOKIA making mobile phone applications and services particularly addressing the needs of people in emerging market countries.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: I'm cool.

lenders.name: Greener LA
lenders.loan_because: We understand that a single person has the potential to make an enormous impact on our world and environment.  We loan because we care about our fellow citizens of the world and we believe in working together for a better tomorrow.
lenders.occupational_info: Greener L.A. is Southern California's premier home and commercial cleaning company. We are committed to cleaning with a conscience in order to benefit the health and lives of our customers. Commercially, we are dedicated to working with businesses to create progressive sustainability solutions to reduce their carbon footprint and detoxicate their working environment to the benefit of employees and the planet.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to help another human being.
